description: The target value, average value, or average utilization of a specific metric

averageUtilization.description: Target value of the average of the resource metric across all relevant Pods, represented as a percentage of the requested value of the resource for the Pods. Currently only valid for '`Resource`' metric source type

averageValue.description: The target value of the average of the metric across all relevant Pods (as a quantity)

value.description: The target value of the metric (as a quantity).
